card.name: Ars Almadel Salomonis
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Ars Almadel Salomonis, remove ten loyalty counters from a planeswalker you control that shares a True Name with it. Cumulative upkeep—Ars Almadel Solomonis deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Indestructible Remove 14 age counters from Ars Almadel Salomonis and sacrifice it: You win the game.

card.name: Nursery Rhyme
card.text: Nursery Rhyme is the colors of permanents you control. When Nursery Rhyme enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Nursery Rhyme’s power is equal to 7 minus the number of cards in the chosen player’s hand, and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

card.name: Food
card.text: 2, T, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

Cumulative upkeep 1 When Ionioi Hetairoi enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Servant creature cards and put them onto the battlefield, then put that many age counters on it. When Ionioi Hetairoi leaves the battlefield, shuffle all Servant creatures you control that don’t share a True Name with it into their owners’ libraries.

card.name: Leonardo Bistario Harwey
card.text: White servants you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Lord Camelot
card.text: Sacrifice Lord Camelot if you don’t control a creature that shares a True Name with it. At the beginning of each upkeep, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

card.text: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn. If you control a creature that shares a True Name with Lord Chaldeas, prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by sources you don’t control.

card.name: Lord El-Melloi II
card.text: 2W: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +2/+2, gains vigilance if it’s white, gains flying if it’s blue, gains deathtouch if it’s black, gains haste if it’s red, and gains reach if it’s green.

card.name: Saint Martha

card.name: Saint War Order

Cumulative upkeep 1 (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) card.text: First strike, haste At the beginning of each upkeep, prevent the next 4 noncombat damage that would be dealt to Cu Chulainn, Child of the Sun this turn. When Cu Chulainn, Child of the Sun dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Edison King of Inventors
card.text: Vigilance T: Copy target non-Phantasm instant or sorcery spell you don’t control. You may choose new targets for the copy. At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 4/4 red, white, and blue Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Elizabeth Bathory Blood Countess
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks or is blocked by Elizabeth Bathory, Blood Countess, that creature gets -1/-1 until end of combat. R: Elizabeth Bathory, Blood Countess gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Emiya Forgotten Hero
card.text: 5: Choose target Equipment card in a graveyard or Equipment on the battlefield, and create a token that’s a copy of it attached to Emiya, Forgotten Hero. Sacrifice the copy at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Emiya Kiritsugu Mage Killer
card.text: 1U: Put an age counter on target permanent or remove an age counter from it. T, Sacrifice a Servant: Separate all creatures target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all creatures in the pile of their choice.

card.name: Emiya Shirou Projection Mage
card.text: As long as you control a Servant, Emiya Shirou, Projection Mage has the True Name EMIYA. Sacrifice Emiya Shirou, Projection Mage: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Servants you control this turn. 5: Target Servant you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Enuma Elish
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Enuma Elish, tap a creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Exile all Gods. Return all creatures from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Eurayle of the Shapeless Isle
card.text: T: Eurayle of the Shapeless Isle deals 1 damage to any target. 1U: Tap target male creature.

card.name: Fafnir Eternal Dragon
card.text: Flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Fafnir, Eternal Dragon by creatures that don’t have the True Name Siegfried or Sigurd. When Fafnir, Eternal Dragon dies, search your library for a card with the True Name Siegfried or Sigurd, and put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fergus Knight of the Red Branch
card.text: As long as you control a female creature or planeswalker, Fergus, Knight of the Red Branch gets +2/+2. Protection from Cu Chulainn (This permanent can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with the True Name Cu Chulainn.)

card.name: Fionn mac Cumhaill
card.text: T: You gain 2 life. Whenever Fionn mac Cumhaill attacks, scry 1. Sacrifice a Food: Draw a card.

card.name: Flame Gloved Dancer
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have Flame Gloved Dancer fight target creature you don’t control. If you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Francis Drake
card.text: Islandguide, haste Whenever Francis Drake deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card. T: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Gaius Julius Caesar
card.text: Defender, first strike Discard a card: Gaius Julius Caesar loses defender, gets +2/+0 until end of turn and doesn’t untap during your next untap step. At the beginning of your end step, if Gaius Julius Caesar didn’t attack this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: An Gal Ta Kigal She
card.text: As an additional cost to cast An Gal Ta Kigal She, tap a God creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Choose one — • Destroy all creatures. • Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. • Each player chooses a basic land type, then destroy all lands of the chosen types. You gain 1 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

card.name: Gate of Babylon
card.text: Sacrifice Gate of Babylon if you don’t control a creature that shares a True Name with it. 1: Search your library for an artifact card and put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. This ability costs 1 more to activate for each time it’s been activated this turn.

card.name: Gil Clairvoyant Youth
card.text: When Gil, Clairvoyant Youth enters the battlefield, scry 5, then exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Gilgamesh King of Heroes
card.text: Flying, trample As long as Gilgamesh, King of Heroes is on the battlefield, it has all True Names. Discard an artifact card: Gilgamesh, King of Heroes deals damage to any target equal to the discarded card’s converted mana cost.

card.name: God Spear Li Shuwen
card.text: Deathtouch, berserk 1B: God Spear Li Shuwen loses berserk until end of turn. 2G, T: God Spear Li Shuwen fights target creature you don’t control.

card.text: Deathtouch T: Target creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. When Gorgon Sister Medusa dies, create a 7/7 white Pegasus creature token with flying and trample.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life. Servants you control get +2/+0 and have berserk. (They must attack if able and must be blocked if able.)

card.name: Medea Lily
card.text: If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 2 instead. T: Remove all age counters from target creature and destroy all auras attached to it you don’t control.

card.name: Mozart Composer Savant
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one — • Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. • Spells you cast cost 1 less to cast until end of turn. • Draw a card.

card.text: Cumulative upkeep 1 At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, as long as you control a creature that shares a True Name with Nameless Forest, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Nero Bride of the White Rose
card.text: Whenever Nero, Bride of the White Rose and at least one other creature attack, creatures you control get +4/+0 until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, if Nero, Bride of the White Rose didn’t attack this turn, you may discard a card at random. If you don’t, sacrifice Nero.

card.text: Berserk (This vehicle must attack if able and must be blocked if able.) Soulcrew 4 (Tap a creature that shares a True Name with this vehicle, or any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Rho Aias
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, prevent the next 7 damage that would dealt to equipped creature this turn. Whenever equipped creature is dealt damage, sacrifice Rho Aias. Soulequip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Rhongomyniad
card.text: Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has trample. Sacrifice equipped creature: Exile all creatures. Soulequip 2WW

card.name: Rhongomyniad Corrupted
card.text: Catalyst Sacrifice a creature: Equipped creature gains power equal to that creature’s base power until end of turn. Soulequip 1B

card.name: Rins Pendant
card.text: Catalyst (When this enters the battlefield, search your library for a Servant card that shares a True Name with it and put that card into your hand.) Sacrifice Rin’s Pendant: Add CCC.

card.name: Roaring Flames of Wisdom
card.text: Sacrifice Roaring Flames of Wisdom: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn. Draw two cards.

card.name: Rotary Matchlock
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 for each rider class Servant card in all graveyards, and has “T: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature and each Rider class creature that creature’s controller controls.” Soulequip 2

card.name: Rule Breaker
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals damage to another creature, remove all damage from that creature and gain control of it. Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a player, destroy all enchantments that player controls. Soulequip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Salmon of Knowledge
card.text: 1: Salmon of Knowledge becomes a 1/1 Fish creature with islandguide in addition to its other types until end of turn. 2, T, Sacrifice Salmon of Knowledge: You gain 3 life. Draw two cards.

card.name: Sanat Kumara
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Sanat Kumara, tap a creature that shares a True Name with it. Flying, trample Soulcrew 6

card.name: Silver Bullet
card.text: Cumulative upkeep 1 1, Remove an age counter from Silver Bullet: Target creature you control that shares a True Name with Silver Bullet gains deathtouch until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

card.name: Silver Earring
card.text: Catalyst (When this enters the battlefield, search your library for a Servant card that shares a True Name with it and put that card into your hand.) T, Sacrifice Silver Earring: Return target creature card that shares a True Name with it from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Spiral Sword Caladbolg
card.text: Catalyst (When this enters the battlefield, search your library for a Servant card that shares a True Name with it and put that card into your hand.) Whenever equipped creature attacks, it gets +X/+X and trample, where X is the number of lands the defending player controls. Soulequip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sword of Mars
card.text: Catalyst Equipped creature gets +X/+X where X is the number of land cards in all graveyards. Soulequip 2

card.name: Sword of Paracelsus
card.text: X: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each color of mana spent to activate this ability. Soulequip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: System Keraunos
card.text: Cumulative upkeep 1 Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put an age counter on System Keraunos. Equipped creature gets +2/+2 for each age counter on System Keraunos. Remove all age counters from System Keraunos: Equipped creature deals X damage divided as you choose to any number of targets, where X is double the number of counters removed this way. Soulequip 2

card.name: Tauropolos
card.text: Equipped creature has reach and “T: This creature deals 7 damage to target creature.” Soulequip 2

card.name: Tick-Tock Bomb
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Tick-Tock Bomb, tap a creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Cumulative upkeep 1 When Tick-Tock Bomb dies, it deals 7 damage to its controller. At the beginning of the end step, target opponent gains control of Tick-Tock Bomb.

card.name: Torch of Wisdom
card.text: Sacrifice Torch of Wisdom: Add CCC. Draw two cards.

card.name: Trap of Argalia
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike. Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a creature, that creature’s controller may flip a coin. Unless they win the flip, that creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. Soulequip 3

card.name: Usumidori
card.text: Equipped creature has haste and can’t be blocked by multiple creatures. Soulequip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Vasavi Shakti
card.text: Equipped creature gets +6/+6 and has trample. Whenever equipped creature attacks, unattach Vasavi Shakti at end of combat unless it’s blocked by a God creature. Soulequip 8

card.name: Wheel of Sunlight
card.text: Equipped creature has protection from black and swampguide. (As long as defending player controls a swamp, it can’t be blocked except by other creatures with swampguide.) Equip 6 Soulequip 1 (1: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Wicker Man
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Wicker Man, tap a caster class creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Cumulative upkeep 1 Trample, berserk (This creature must attack if able and must be blocked if able.)

card.name: Yew Bow
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals damage to another creature, Yew Bow deals 3 damage to that creature’s controller. Soulequip 1 (1: Attach to target creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Dún Scáith Land of Shadows
card.text: Whenever a card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile that card and its owner creates a 1/1 black Spirit creature token with flying. T: Add B.

card.name: Prison Castle Csejte
card.text: Prison Castle Csejte enters the battlefield tapped. As long as you control a creature that shares a True Name with Prison Castle Csejte, creatures you don’t control get -2/-2. T: Add R or B.

card.name: Rome
card.text: Rome enters the battlefield tapped. When Rome enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Servant card with the True Name Romulus, Nero Claudius, or Gaius Julius Ceasar and put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. T: Add U, R or W.

card.name: Ryuudou Temple
card.text: Cumulative upkeep costs your opponents pay cost 1 more. T: Add CC.

card.name: Shapeless Island
card.text: (T: Add U.) When Shapeless Island enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Servant card with the True Name Medusa, Eurayle, or Stheno and put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Creatures with islandguide can be blocked as though they didn’t have islandguide.

card.name: Stone Sentinel Maze
card.text: T: If you control a creature that shares a True Name with Stone Sentinel Maze, until the beginning of your next upkeep, target creature you don’t control doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step and gains “Cumulative Upkeep 1.” 2, T: You gain 1 life.

card.name: La Grâce Fille Noël
card.text: Create X Food tokens, where X is the number of creatures you control that share a True Name with La Grâce Fille Noël.

card.name: Chloe von Einzbern
card.text: T, Exile an Equipment card from your graveyard: Chloe von Einzbern deals 3 damage to any target. 2, Tap another male or female creature you control: Untap Chloe von Einzbern.

card.name: Bathory the Brave
card.text: Cumulative upkeep 1 Bathory the Brave gets +1/+1 for each age counter on it. T, Remove all age counters from Bathory the Brave: Bathory the Brave deals damage to any target equal to the number of removed counters.

card.name: Jeanne Alter Santa Lily
card.text: First strike Whenever Jeanne Alter Santa Lily deals combat damage to a player, each player creates a Food token.

card.name: Mumyou Sandan-Zuki
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Mumyou Sandan-Zuki, tap a creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Until end of turn, creatures you control gain double strike, and creatures you don’t control without first strike or double strike can’t attack or block.

card.name: Okita Souji Shinsengumi Captain
card.text: First strike At the beginning of each combat, you may untap up to two other creatures.

card.name: Santa Artoria Alter
card.text: Menace, trample 1W, T: Each player gains 3 life. 1G, T: Each player draws a card.

card.name: Kiku-ichimonji
card.text: Catalyst Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and damage dealt by it can’t be prevented. Soulequip 3

card.name: Llamrei Unit II
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Llamrei Unit II, tap a creature you control that shares a True Name with it. Flying Whenever Llamrei Unit II is crewed by a Santa creature, each player may search their library for a card and put it into their hand, then shuffle their library. Soulcrew 3
